title: FS:  T206 HOF Young and M Brown, others
author: Edwolf1963

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 HOF Young and M Brown, others
posts.post_content:
FS:  T206 Cy Young Bare Hand, M Brown Cubs and a couple commons.  All graded, see scans.  Prices are shipped - PayPal payment owed or check.  First email or PM.  Thanks!

*  Cy Young Bare Hand, SC150, PSA3 - $475
*  M Brown Cubs on Shirt, SGC40, P150 - $200
*  G Schaefer (Washington), PB, SGC40 - $45
*  Jim McGinley, SOV350, PSA3 - $45 **SOLD**
One and only price drop.  Otherwise back in the cabinet or eBay ;)
